description: Useful for carrying money, documents, or smuggled goods.
Useful to carry your precious musical instrument around protected from any harm.
An ultralight nylon backpack intended for one-day hiking trips.  Waterproof, slim, and spacious.

//: based on the condor deployment bag and it's derivatives, holds 6.4L and has dimensions 6in H x 5.5in D x 12in W, max item lengths determined by approximating a little less based on dimensions
description: A durable nylon bag marketed towards military personnel.  It has clips on the top and back, making it easy to attach a strap and wear it comfortably as a fanny pack.  MOLLE webbing on the back lets you affix it to body armor or a backpack.

pocket_data.description: Center pocket.
Front pocket.
Side pocket.
Side pocket.

description: A lightweight mesh backpack, commonly worn by swimmers and divers.
A huge duffel bag.  Provides plenty of storage, but is severely encumbering.

pocket_data.//: items slipped under the top of a duffelbag not well secured
pocket_data.description: Tucked under the carry handles.

description: An expandable pouch secured with straps.  Provides a bit of extra storage with minimal encumbrance.

A small fabric bag worn on the waist, with the pouch in front for easy access.  Once used as a visual shorthand for unstylish geeks and silly tourists, it was making a decent comeback before the apocalypse.
A tall canvas and plastic bag with fold-out legs used for golfing.  It even has straps to be worn on the back and a slot for an umbrella.
//: The main section of the golf bag actually assumes things will stick out of it, but specifically contains them, so some extra wiggle room was added.

description: The raw skin of an animal, quickly turned into a makeshift bag for storage.  It will still rot, and needs to be cured and tanned.
The raw skin of a monster, quickly turned into a makeshift bag for storage.  It will still rot, and needs to be cured and tanned.

This is a plain, hard-sided black briefcase with a trigger in the handle and a concealed hole in the side.  Squeezing the trigger would currently do nothing, as it is empty.  Don't forget to put a suitable MP5 back inside before you try to pay any ransom fees with lead.
A jerrycan modified to be worn in a similar manner to a backpack.
A bag stitched together from leather scraps.  Doesn't hold an awful lot but is easy to wear.
A set of pouches that can be worn on the thighs using buckled straps.  This variety is favored by the military.
A bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps.  Provides some extra storage for outdoor activities.

variants.description: A black bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps.  Commonly used by motorcycle riders.
A khaki bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps.  Works nicely with a pair of khaki pants.
A purple bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps.  Perfect for the ladies that want a cooler way of carrying their personal items.
A green bag with camouflage print that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps.  For those that have a military heart.
A black and dark gold bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps, with a steampunk design and chains all over it.  Perfect for a wide variety of costumes.
A jet-black bag that can be worn on the thighs and hips using adjustable buckled straps, with skulls and spikes all over it.  Perfect for a rider of the apocalypse.

description: A small purse that can be worn on the upper leg using buckled straps, easier to use than on the arm.  For those who want to wear a dress without pockets while carrying their phone and money.  Use it to adjust it to fit your arm.

pocket_data.//: Less moves as the arm version since grabing things wrapped around your legs is easier.

use_action.msg: You adjust your %s to wear it on your arm.

description: A small pouch that can be worn on the upper arm using buckled straps.  This is a favoured item among sports & camping enthusiasts.  Use it to adjust it to fit your leg.

use_action.msg: You adjust your %s to wear it on your leg.

description: A small concealed wallet pouch worn on the ankle.  If you strap it under your clothes, it can help you keep your wallet hidden and safe.
A pair of pants with the bottom ends tied with string, and then passed through the belt loops so the knapsack can be carried on the back.

pocket_data.description: Tucked between your back and the backpack.

description: A large sheet tied into a crude, over-the-shoulder sling.

//: KA101's ran about $90 but is ballistic nylon.  Bit tougher than the DDA model.
description: Light and easy to wear, but doesn't offer much storage.

//: Based upon own service and wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MOLLE
description: The Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment is an advanced military backpack.  Covered with pockets and straps, it strikes a fine balance between storage space and encumbrance.  Can attach accessory pockets to the outside rigging.

description: A bag woven together from strings, with straps to wear it on back.  Lighter than a standard backpack, but more awkward to carry when loaded and unable to hold small or heavy items.
Before the Cataclysm this would allow your four-legged friend to see the world, now it's used to shield them from the world.
A bag used to carry groceries home.
A fancy leather purse from a well-known designer.  A bit cumbersome to wear, but provides some storage.
A makeshift bag, cobbled together from rags.  Really gets in the way, but provides a decent amount of storage.
A huge military rucksack, provides a lot of storage.

description: The obvious choice for outdoor athletes, this ergonomic backpack is light and easy to wear, ensuring comfort when carrying heavy and bulky items.

//: Depends on if you're getting a cheap school version or something more like a range bag.
description: A simple single-sling backpack.  Easier to access than a normal backpack, but can't comfortably hold as much.
A handmade straw basket.  Carry it with you for extra storage.

//: You drag it along with you, so it taking a hit is Rare.
description: A huge wheeled suitcase used mainly for transporting clothes and other possessions during trips, provides a decent amount of storage but hauling it around is neither fast nor comfortable.
A mid-sized wheeled suitcase used mainly for transporting clothes and other possessions during trips, provides a decent amount of storage but hauling it around is not exactly comfortable.
A large canvas sack, re-purposed for makeshift storage.  Goes well with a striped shirt and a domino mask.
A hiking pack used for short trips.

description: A light vest covered in pockets and straps for storage.
A large handmade straw basket with a lid and shoulder straps to wear it like a backpack.  Less comfortable than a proper backpack, but will do the job.
A pocket universe.  Can store approximately 384 * 10^6 bugs.
A long duffel bag.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Quite cumbersome.
A long soft rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A long soft rifle case.  Provides storage for 2 long arms and rifles.  Includes 3 accessory pockets and a strap.
A long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for 2 long arms and rifles.  Includes 3 accessory pockets and a strap.
An extra long soft leather rifle case.  Provides storage for long arms and rifles.  Includes a small pocket, strap and handle.
A simple bag used to hold a camera, with a small pocket on the side for accessories.  Comes with a carry strap.
An old-fashioned book strap carrier.  Guaranteed to make you feel like a proper scholar.

A length of rope tied with a sliding knot into a loop.  You can slip all sorts of large objects in and carry them as a bundle; if you want to tie a single item more securely you'd have to disassemble this loop.  It takes a while to untie it and get things out, and attackers might pull the whole thing undone if you're not careful.
A wooden frame with waterproofed cloth stretched around it, and a drawstring at the top to hold things in.  It has straps to wear it on your back.
An L-shaped wooden frame with a waterproofed cloth sack attached to it.  There's a drawstring to hold things in and straps to carry it on your back.
